name: Finset.mul_add_subset
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : DecidableEq α
inst✝ : Distrib α
s t u : Finset α
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (HMul.hMul s (HAdd.hAdd t u)) (HAdd.hAdd (HMul.hMul s t) (HMul.hMul s u))
decl:
lemma mul_add_subset : s * (t + u) ⊆ s * t + s * u :=
  image₂_distrib_subset_left mul_add

name: Finset.add_mul_subset
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : DecidableEq α
inst✝ : Distrib α
s t u : Finset α
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (HMul.hMul (HAdd.hAdd s t) u) (HAdd.hAdd (HMul.hMul s u) (HMul.hMul t u))
decl:
lemma add_mul_subset : (s + t) * u ⊆ s * u + t * u :=
  image₂_distrib_subset_right add_mul

name: Finset.neg_smul_finset
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝³ : Ring α
inst✝² : AddCommGroup β
inst✝¹ : Module α β
inst✝ : DecidableEq β
t : Finset β
a : α
⊢ Eq (HSMul.hSMul (Neg.neg a) t) (Neg.neg (HSMul.hSMul a t))
decl:
@[simp]
lemma neg_smul_finset : -a • t = -(a • t) := by
  simp only [← image_smul, ← image_neg_eq_neg, image_image, neg_smul, Function.comp_def]

name: Finset.neg_smul
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : Ring α
inst✝³ : AddCommGroup β
inst✝² : Module α β
inst✝¹ : DecidableEq β
s : Finset α
t : Finset β
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
⊢ Eq (HSMul.hSMul (Neg.neg s) t) (Neg.neg (HSMul.hSMul s t))
decl:
@[simp]
protected lemma neg_smul [DecidableEq α] : -s • t = -(s • t) := by
  simp_rw [← image_neg_eq_neg]
  exact image₂_image_left_comm neg_smul
